net.homeip.donaldm.httpdbase4j
Class Request

java.lang.Object
  net.homeip.donaldm.httpdbase4j.Request
All Implemented Interfaces:
DirItemInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArchiveRequest, CombinedRequest, FileRequest
public abstract class Request
extends java.lang.Object
implements DirItemInterface

Abstraction of an HTTP request

Author:
Donald Munro
See Also:
ArchiveRequest, FileRequest, CombinedRequest

getChildRequest

public abstract Request getChildRequest(java.lang.String name)
Create a request from the current directory request combined with a file or directory in the current directory

Parameters:
name - The name of a file or directory in the current request if the current request is a directory
Returns:
A new Request or null if request is not a directory

getDirListFiles

public abstract java.util.TreeSet<DirItemInterface> getDirListFiles(DirItemInterface.SORTBY sortBy)
Return a list of files in a resource directory.

Parameters:
sortBy - Specify how the files should be sorted. This is an instance of DirItemInterface.SORTBY ie NAME, DATE or SIZE).
Returns:
A TreeSet (sortable set) of DirItemInterface implementing instances. Returns null if the resource is not a directory.
See Also:
DirItemInterface

getDirListDirectories

public abstract java.util.TreeSet<DirItemInterface> getDirListDirectories(DirItemInterface.SORTBY sortBy)
Return a list of directories in a resource directory.

Parameters:
sortBy - Specify how the files should be sorted. This is an instance of DirItemInterface.SORTBY ie NAME, DATE or SIZE).
Returns:
A TreeSet (sortable set) of DirItemInterface implementing instances. Returns null if the resource is not a directory.
See Also:
DirItemInterface

getStream

public abstract java.io.InputStream getStream(boolean isEncoded)
Return a stream of the resource contents.

Parameters:
isEncoded - If true will return a stream for the encoded (eg gzip or deflate) resource or if cacheing is allowed for this request and the encoded resource is in the cache then a stream for the cached version. If false returns a stream for the unencoded resource. If there is no encoding ie the client does not support encoding then both true and false return a stream for the unencoded resource.
Returns:
A stream of the resource contents.

getStream

public java.io.InputStream getStream()
Specified by:
getStream in interface DirItemInterface
Returns:
A stream of the resource contents (encoded content is returned if available).

getETag

public abstract java.lang.String getETag(boolean refresh)
Parameters:
refresh - If true recalculate the tag hash even if it has already been calculated, if false reuse the cached value
Returns:
The ETag cacheing hash for this request

public boolean checkClientCache()

isCacheable

public boolean isCacheable()
Returns:
true if the Request result should be cached (checks for Cache-Control and Pragma:NoCache headers)

compressEncoding

public java.lang.String[] compressEncoding()
Determine the compression encodings supported by the client.

Returns:
A String array with the encodings accepted by the client, ordered by most desired encoding: gzip = GZip encoded deflate = Deflate encoded txt = No compression
